title.rendered: Saratoga Springs High School School Photos for Grades 9-11

content.rendered:
As the official Yearbook Photographers for Saratoga High School we are

pleased to announce that school photos are scheduled for:

  • Wednesday, September 14th, 2022 (Day 1)
  • Thursday, September 15th, 2022 (Day 2)
  • Friday, September 16th, 2022 (Day 3)


Photos will be taken in the High School Auditorium.


Photo envelopes will be distributed to your student the week prior to photos. (Week of September 6th, 2022)
Prepay online by credit card at:

www.adirondack school portraits.com

*prices shown include applicable NYS Sales Tax*
1: Select “Click here to order your photos”

2: Follow instructions and type in your

school code: 17SARHS22
